title: Unable to login: URGENT
body:
Hi, 

So this morning i have just finished updating my client to the new hextech one but before i can login a message pops up and says "There is a problem with your connection. If you are not currently connected to the internet, please do so..." problem is i am connected. Then im given a choice whether to restart the client or shutdown, either way, the same message pops up and i cant log in. {{item:3070}} {{summoner:3}}

replies.body:
Hey there,

Are you using a wired or wireless connection?

Could you try, [switching to a public DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5) for me. Let me know if this helps.
its happening again and im using a public dns
thank you so much and have long happy life
i had both ipv 6 and 4 i thought i only needed to change 4 to a public dns but i also needed to change 6
